reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress chic with an adorable open back, comfortable, and flattering, with one noting its A-line flare is incredibly flattering. The material quality receives mixed feedback - while some say it's thick enough not to be see-through, others find it cheap and thin. Customers disagree on the fit, with some finding it perfect while others say the straps are tight. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sexy, Classy, and Super Comfortable!
items.body: I wore this ABYOVRT backless mini dress for my college graduation, and it was absolutely perfect! Iâ€™m on the skinnier side, so I had it tailored to fit my waist and be snatched, and it looked amazing. The material is thick enough not to be see-through, soft, and not itchy at all, so I could wear it comfortably all day. The open-back design adds a sexy touch, while the overall style remains elegant and classy, making it perfect for graduation. I felt confident, stylish, and feminine, and received so many compliments. If you want a dress thatâ€™s sexy, classy, comfortable, and flattering, this is definitely the one! ðŸŽ“âœ¨ðŸ¤ Read more
items.author: Penelope Avalo Perez

items.author: Izzy

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars WEIRD FIT, WEIRD SMELL, COLOR NOT AS EXPECTED
items.body: Ordered the â€œwine redâ€ option but it was really a BRIGHT red. The color is not as expected at all. The shape was weird and unflattering as well. For reference, Iâ€™m a 32C and ordered a S but the top fits weird and loose - Iâ€™d say this dress runs large and long. The item also smells really bad. Read more
items.author: marcelina

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile! Comfortable and so flattering! Investment piece to interchange!
items.body: 5'3, 139lbs, size 4-6 and the Medium fits so comfortably! I bought this when I was a size 8 and it also fit great then! I could do a small now, but it still fits great. Stretchy but still holds you in as the material is thicker. That being said, I have many dresses but this is my go to for work with a cute jacket, or a summer wedding! I bought the black and love it! a pair of cakes or a sticky bra will do the trick, don't over think it! It will hold you in a bit. I am a B cup now, but was a C cup and did not have an issue. Such a great piece and the quality will last! Read more
items.author: Traci

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful engagement dress, good quality and flattering!
items.body: This dress is wonderful! The material doesn't feel cheap and the zipper in the back feels like it's decent quality as well. The structure of it holds well and it's very flattering. The more open back is a nice, elegant touch. Looking forward to wearing this dress for my engagement party! Read more
items.author: Lindsey Beck

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars perfect silhouette, fabric is meh
items.body: silhouette is gorgeous, the fabric feels a little cheap, but youâ€™d only notice if you were looking so so close. Read more
items.author: Madison

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it
items.body: Cute dress! I would buy it again. Used it for my Christmas minis & I bought it again for another Christmas party but in black. Very nice!!! Read more
items.author: Nancy Ruiz

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Yes queen give us nothing.
items.body: Iâ€™ll give it two stars for the stretchiness. The size was spit on around the waist but the flare around the hips sits wrong. It is double layered on the top, but I could still see my very thin, no design, nude thong bright as day. The actually product is way longer than the photo. It just felt wrong. I ordered it for my graduation dress, so I tried to love it. Donâ€™t let the price make you feel like it will be good quality because this isnâ€™t it tbh. Read more
items.author: Yuki

short_description:
Womens Dress Formal Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Dress Formal Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine Red, White, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
